title: False negative in object list
description: An object present in ground truth is not detected by the sensor

title: Reflectance of objects
description: Reflectance being a measure of the capability to reflect portions of incoming light while other portions are absorbed and/or transmitted.
references: [2, Vitro, CV-HAZOP Checklist, https://vitro-testing.com/cv-hazop/, Risk Id 706; 707]

title: Reflective object close to observer
description: Short mutual distance between reflective object and observer.
references: [27, Vitro, CV-HAZOP Checklist, https://vitro-testing.com/cv-hazop/, Risk Id 706; 707] [28, Vitro, CV-HAZOP Checklist, https://vitro-testing.com/cv-hazop/, Risk Id 706]

title: Wave properties of light sources
description: Light which is emitted by a light source is being considered an electromagnetic wave, respectively a range of merged electromagnetic waves. Thus, it is being determined by corresponding wave properties such as wavelength, amplitude, phase, polarization and direction of propagation.
references: [5, Vitro, CV-HAZOP Checklist, https://vitro-testing.com/cv-hazop/, Risk Id 161]

title: Light of some source is more polarized or coherent than expected
references: [7, Vitro, CV-HAZOP Checklist, https://vitro-testing.com/cv-hazop/, Risk Id 161]

title: Observation with polarization filters
description: Polarization filters being used to eliminate amplitudes of passing light, but only those whose angular directions deviate from a specific angle of the considered filter.
references: [7, Vitro, CV-HAZOP Checklist, https://vitro-testing.com/cv-hazop/, Risk Id 161, Directional elimination of amplitudes leading to decreasing energy of passing light. Consequently, light intensity is being reduced.]

title: Extinction of light intensity in reception unit
description: Intensity of incoming light being determined by its energy per time per cross sectional area. Thus, the structure of the reception unit itself may influence passing light.
references: [8, Vitro, CV-HAZOP Checklist, https://vitro-testing.com/cv-hazop/, Risk Id 161]

title: Viewing position of observer-optomechanics
references: [10, Vitro, CV-HAZOP Checklist, https://vitro-testing.com/cv-hazop/, Risk Id 904]

title: Observer moves faster than expected
references: [12, Vitro, CV-HAZOP Checklist, https://vitro-testing.com/cv-hazop/, Risk Id 904]

title: Exposure time
references: [12, Vitro, CV-HAZOP Checklist, https://vitro-testing.com/cv-hazop/, Risk Id 904]

title: Motion blur
references: [13, Vitro, CV-HAZOP Checklist, https://vitro-testing.com/cv-hazop/, Risk Id 904]

title: Geometry of lenses in observer-optomechanics
references: [15, Vitro, CV-HAZOP Checklist, https://vitro-testing.com/cv-hazop/, Risk Id 982; 983]

title: Strongly curved lens surfaces

title: Distortion: barrel or pincushion
